block.p: LEXIS-NEXIS, Dayton, Ohio, the legal information provider owned by the international publishing company Reed Elsevier P.L.C., said it acquired Press Access Inc., Boston. Terms were not disclosed.

BOEING CO., Seattle, as part of its expansion into computerized maintenance services, said that it had acquired the software company AeroInfo Systems Inc. Boeing would not say how much it paid to acquire AeroInfo, a privately held 14-person company in Richmond, British Columbia.
LEXIS-NEXIS, Dayton, Ohio, the legal information provider owned by the international publishing company Reed Elsevier P.L.C., said it acquired Press Access Inc., Boston. Terms were not disclosed.

BOEING CO., Seattle, as part of its expansion into computerized maintenance services, said that it had acquired the software company AeroInfo Systems Inc. Boeing would not say how much it paid to acquire AeroInfo, a privately held 14-person company in Richmond, British Columbia.

CUSHMAN & WAKEFIELD INC., New York, one of the world's largest real estate services firms, bought Japan Property Advisors K.K., a commercial real estate company based in Tokyo, now known as Cushman & Wakefield K.K. Terms were not disclosed.

UGI CORP., King of Prussia, Pa., the largest U.S. propane distributor, said it bought for an undisclosed price the southeastern Pennsylvania and nothern Delaware heating and cooling service businesses of Conectiv, Wilmington Del.
